Terms of Service

Last updated: January 2026

Welcome to Simpson Me! These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of our website simpsonme.com and the purchase of our custom Simpsons-style portrait services. By accessing or using our Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms.

1. Overview

Simpson Me provides custom hand-drawn Simpsons-style portrait services. Our artists create personalized cartoon portraits based on the photos you provide. By placing an order, you agree to these Terms of Service.

2. Products and Services

We offer custom digital and printed Simpsons-style portraits. Each portrait is:

  • 100% hand-drawn by professional artists (no AI filters)
  • Created based on the photos you upload
  • Delivered digitally and/or as physical merchandise

3. Ordering Process

1. Place your order: Select your options and upload your photo(s)

2. Artist creates your portrait: First draft delivered within 2-3 business days

3. Review and revisions: Request unlimited free revisions until you're satisfied

4. Final approval: Once approved, your order is finalized

5. Shipping (if applicable): Physical products ship within 4-12 business days after approval

4. Photo Requirements

To ensure the best quality portrait, please provide:

  • Clear, high-resolution photos
  • Photos where faces are clearly visible
  • Photos you have the right to use

We reserve the right to request additional photos if the provided images are not suitable for creating a quality portrait.

5. Unlimited Revisions

We offer unlimited free revisions on your portrait. Our goal is your complete satisfaction. You may request changes to:

  • Facial features and expressions
  • Clothing and accessories
  • Background elements
  • Colors and styling

Revisions must be requested within 30 days of receiving your first draft.

6. Intellectual Property

Your Photos: You retain all rights to the photos you upload. By uploading, you grant us a limited license to use them solely for creating your portrait.

Your Portrait: Once your order is complete and paid for, you receive a personal, non-commercial license to use your custom portrait for personal purposes.

Commercial Use: Commercial use of portraits requires separate written permission from Simpson Me.

7. Pricing and Payment

  • All prices are displayed in USD unless otherwise stated
  • Payment is required at the time of ordering
  • We accept major credit cards and PayPal
  • Prices may change without notice, but confirmed orders will be honored at the original price

8. Delivery

Digital Delivery: Digital files are delivered via email within 2-3 business days (first draft).

Physical Products: Printed merchandise ships within 4-12 business days after you approve your final design.

9. Cancellation

You may cancel your order before work begins on your portrait for a full refund. Once our artists have started working on your portrait, cancellation is subject to our Refund Policy.

10. Disclaimer

Our portraits are artistic interpretations inspired by the Simpsons art style. Simpson Me is not affiliated with, endorsed by, or connected to The Simpsons, Fox, or Disney.

11. Contact Us

If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us:

  • Email: support@simpsonme.com
  • Address: Simpson Me, 800 N State College Blvd, Cal State Fullerton, Fullerton, CA 92831, USA
